name: FISH KILL
description:
"You're in a boat, relaxing. Dangle your arm over the side so that your fingertips slide across the water. Don't get it bitten off."

Hold space to put your hand in the water and get points

The more fish there are on the screen, the faster you get points

Click fish to remove them, but be careful when removing the eels


By Hexadecima1, made for #mhotgibgj

Note: this has very little to do with actual fish kill, or the town of Fishkill
